R0066.title: In-Platform Message Harassment
R0066.definition: Using the platform's messaging mechanism to send harassing messages to others.
R0066.description: Unlike text content risks, message harassment is carefully crafted to evade keyword blacklists and may not trigger the platform's keyword alerts. Message harassment is a widespread risk. Some platforms allow users to configure which groups of people can send them messages, which is an effective defensive strategy.
R0066.influence: Causes significant disruption to platform customer service or merchants; in severe cases may lead to user churn or physical harm.
